description.en:
Limit the maximum number of animals in husbandry pens, pastures, and buildings.
Multiplayer support with permission system - admins can modify any pen (use console for other farms), farm managers can modify their farm's pens.
Features: - Easy limit dialog: Press L at any animal trigger to set limits - Direct number input with automatic validation - Limits persist across save/load - Multiplayer support with permission system - Console commands available for advanced users
Usage: 1. Walk to any animal loading trigger and press L 2. Enter your desired limit in the dialog (min/max bounds shown) 3. Press OK to apply
Console Commands (advanced): - lhaList: Show all husbandries with limits - lhaSet <index> <limit>: Set a custom limit - lhaReset <index>: Reset to original capacity
Changelog: 0.2.1.0: - Clarified multiplayer admin permissions (use console for cross-farm modifications)
0.2.0.0: - Added GUI dialog for setting limits - Direct number input with validation
0.1.0.0: - First functional release - Console commands for limit management - Savegame persistence - Full multiplayer support
